snippet: Blake Geoffrion, whose great-grandfather and grandfather are Canadiens legends, will take the ice at home for the Canadiens for the first time Thursday night since the team acquired him in a trade Feb. 17.
abstract: Blake Geoffrion, whose great-grandfather and grandfather are Canadiens legends, will take the ice at home for the Canadiens for the first time Thursday night since the team acquired him in a trade Feb. 17.

headline.main: Next Geoffrion Takes the Ice in Montreal
